Package org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.drawing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PageViewTool
    A tool for interacting with the document page view.
    PageViewToolListener
    Listener interface for tools that can be plugged in to the document page view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasePageViewTool
    Base class for tools that can be used with the page view class.
    EditOutlineTool
    Tool for adding, moving and deleting polygon points for a page content object.
    RectangleTool
    Tool that allows drawing a rectangle on the document.
